summary: 今日焦点集中于AI安全与系统鲁棒性：OpenClaw暴露事件揭示大规模模型部署风险，GT-HarmBench与角色赋权实验凸显对抗性攻击与偏见传播的深层挑战；同时，多领域融合应用（如制造、人道主义救援）及高效训练框架（如自动数据生成、轻量LLM）展现技术落地新路径。

news.title: [D] We found 18K+ exposed OpenClaw instances and ~15% of community skills contain malicious instructionsc
news.comment: 发现1.8万暴露实例及15%恶意技能，揭示自主代理框架重大安全风险

news.title: GT-HarmBench: Benchmarking AI Safety Risks Through the Lens of Game Theory
news.comment: 首个面向多智能体博弈风险的系统性基准，填补AI安全评估空白

news.title: A Theoretical Framework for Adaptive Utility-Weighted Benchmarking
news.comment: 提出自适应效用加权基准框架，融合多利益相关者视角，对AI评估范式有理论提升意义。

news.title: Evolving Beyond Snapshots: Harmonizing Structure and Sequence via Entity State Tuning for Temporal Knowledge Graph Forecasting
news.comment: 提出Entity State Tuning框架，解决TKG长期依赖衰减问题，具实用价值

news.title: Intent-Driven Smart Manufacturing Integrating Knowledge Graphs and Large Language Models
news.comment: LLM+KG融合实现制造意图驱动，领域适配性强，具实用价值

news.title: Scaling Web Agent Training through Automatic Data Generation and Fine-grained Evaluation
news.comment: 自动数据生成+细粒度评估提升Web Agent训练效率，BookingArena基准具实用价值

news.title: To Mix or To Merge: Toward Multi-Domain Reinforcement Learning for Large Language Models
news.comment: 多领域强化学习训练范式对比研究，填补关键空白，对构建通用AI有重要参考价值。

news.title: A Lightweight LLM Framework for Disaster Humanitarian Information Classification
news.comment: 轻量级LLM框架解决灾难信息分类痛点，LoRA+RAG结合实用性强

news.title: From Biased Chatbots to Biased Agents: Examining Role Assignment Effects on LLM Agent Robustness
news.comment: 首篇系统研究LLM代理角色偏见对性能影响的论文，揭示真实风险，具实用价值

news.title: Retrieval-Augmented Self-Taught Reasoning Model with Adaptive Chain-of-Thought for ASR Named Entity Correction
news.comment: 基于检索增强与自教推理的ASR命名实体纠错框架，有效利用LLM推理能力，具实用价值
